TopicTitle: not sure how to add this mod to ksp

Articles.Content: hi ive just bought the full version of ksp and ive downloaded the kerbal engineer mod . can anyone tell me wht to do plz like wer i place the folders . thx

Well assuming you have Windows as an OS, after you unzip the file, you place the folder Cybutek in your GameData File. You find the GameData file (if you don't know) in the directory called KSP_Win, usually on your C Drive. If you don't have Windows as an Operating System, well hopefully someone else will help you.

thx for the reply voidryder

No prob. Fly Straight and True.
